search

Class GreedyAgentRd

  • java.lang.Object
    • SearchAgent
      • search.GreedyAgentRd

  • public class GreedyAgentRd
extends SearchAgent
    Modification of GreedyAgentNaive to allow problems when cycling. If the agent chooses a DoublePosition already visited, then it omits the greedy behaviour (to avoid cycles) and chooses any random valid movement.

    • Method Detail

      • nextMove

        public int nextMove(Game game)
        Returns:
        the index of the angle in which direction the agent chooses to play at this step. This index is the position of the angle, in radians in array game.SearchAgent#possibleAngles
